response.overview: Itâ€™s adventure beyond imagination! The brave Zone Riders battle, the dreaded Black Widows--plus a mysterious, menacing SPIRAL ZONE that swallows innocent by standards and wreaks world-wide havoc. First, Colonel Dirk Courage and the Zone Riders lead a research team into the "Zone of Darkness." Then, some "Small Packages" create large problems in the form of a devastating Zone Generated Pod. Next, a Spiral Zone escapee turns out to be the "King of the Skies." His ace flying skills thwart The Black Widow's sinister plans. And finally, San Francisco is blockaded in "Holographic Zone Battle."
response.title: Spiral Zone: Zone Of Darkness
